alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Page (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 12 at 2:48PM CDT until October 12 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR MONTGOMERY AND PAGE COUNTIES... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 7 PM CDT THURSDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR MONTGOMERY AND PAGE COUNTIES... A Red Flag Warning remains in effect through 7 PM this evening. Additionally, the National Weather Service in Omaha/Valley has issued a Red Flag Warning for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from noon to 7 PM CDT Thursday. * Affected Area...In Iowa, Montgomery and Page. * Winds...Northwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 28 percent this afternoon, and as low as 20 percent Thursday afternoon. * Impacts...Any fires that ignite may spread rapidly and exhibit extreme fire behavior. Use extreme caution if engaging in any activities that could start a fire. Outdoor burning is not advisable.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
